ygData.subject: Re: Kobold vs Elder Tier'Dal
ygData.msgSnippet: I m guessing that the language skills are not showing up on your Persona skill list until you can actually learn (and thus train them) from your guildmaster.
ygData.messageBody:
I'm guessing that the language skills are not showing up on your Persona
skill list until you can actually learn (and thus train them) from your
guildmaster. They show up in your "spoken languages" section because
you've learned them in travel, trade, et.c.

-Sean

On Thu, 27 May 1999 16:02:19 CDT, Ryo-ohki informed me that
Tom Matthews wrote:
* From: Tom Matthews <tmatthews@...>
*
* Because it is I hate to break the news to you, but you are incorrect. I speak
* all race languages plus, Elder Elvish, Old Erudian, Elder Teir'dal, and Comb
* ine, all to excellent. In the language choice it reads the above mentioned la
* nguages but when
* you look at your skill list Elder Teir'dal is Kobold and Combine is Giant Tou
* nge, I do not know about the remaining languages (Dragon, Old Dragon, and Thi
* eve's Cant) out there but hopefully I will find out. BTW The rest of the lang
* uages match up
* with the same name.
